alert.note: Alert for Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 11 at 4:59AM EST until March 12 at 4:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EST THIS EVENING TO 5 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southeast Suffolk County. * WHEN...From 10 PM EST this evening to 5 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. MORICHES BAY AT EAST MORICHES NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.3 FT, MODERATE 5.3 FT, MAJOR 6.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.9 FT, MODERATE 2.9 FT, MAJOR 3.9 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 11/12 PM 3.5/ 4.0 1.1/ 1.6 1.8/ 2.2 1 NONE 12/12 AM 4.0/ 4.5 1.6/ 2.0 2.0/ 2.5 1 NONE 12/01 PM 3.2/ 3.7 0.9/ 1.4 1.7/ 2.2 0-1 NONE 13/02 AM 3.7/ 4.2 1.3/ 1.8 1.6/ 2.0 0-1 NONE 13/02 PM 3.1/ 3.6 0.7/ 1.1 1.5/ 2.0 1 NONE 14/02 AM 4.0/ 4.5 1.6/ 2.0 2.0/ 2.5 1 NONE SHINNECOCK BAY AT PONQUOQUE NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
